text: Thickened skin 50% Abnormality of the fingernails 7.5% Abnormality of the metaphyses 7.5% Anemia 7.5% Autoimmunity 7.5% Hypothyroidism 7.5% Lymphoma 7.5% Nephrotic syndrome 7.5% Sepsis 7.5% Thyroiditis 7.5% Autosomal recessive inheritance - B lymphocytopenia - Diarrhea - Eosinophilia - Erythroderma - Failure to thrive - Hypoplasia of the thymus - Hypoproteinemia - Pneumonia - Recurrent bacterial infections - Recurrent fungal infections - Recurrent viral infections - Severe B lymphocytopenia - Th
